text:
Dear community, 
Very recently I stumbled across something and that caught me off guard, as
someone that’s intertwined in this patchmanagement group. 
Did you know? Wusa would cause a problem when uninstalling updates and then
trying to install an older CU?
Here’s my finding. Thanks for your replies if you knew about it and when you
figured it out. Thanks! (not asking you abbodii ) 
https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/windows-server-for-it-pro/why-no-longer-using-wusa-to-uninstall-windows-updates/m-p/4023020/highlight/true#M11161
 
Best regards, 
Karl Wester-Ebbinghaus 
Senior IT Consultant 
--
%2460da3360%24228e9a20%24%40chynet.de

metadata.topic: We don't talk about WUSA... - no that's not Western US Azure Datacenter
metadata.subject: [patchmanagement] We don't talk about WUSA... - no that's not Western US Azure Datacenter
metadata.email_text_original:
Sie erhalten nicht oft eine E-Mail von mailtome@chynet.de. Erfahren Sie, warum
dies wichtig ist [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
Dear community, 
Very  recently I stumbled across something and that caught me off guard, as
someone that’s intertwined in this patchmanagement group. 
Did you know? Wusa would cause a problem when uninstalling updates and then
trying to install an older CU?
Here’s my finding. Thanks for your replies if you knew about it and when you
figured it out. Thanks! (not asking you abbodii 😉) 
https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/windows-server-for-it-pro/why-no-longer-using-wusa-to-uninstall-windows-updates/m-p/4023020/highlight/true#M11161
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftechcommunity.microsoft.com%2Ft5%2Fwindows-server-for-it-pro%2Fwhy-no-longer-using-wusa-to-uninstall-windows-updates%2Fm-p%2F4023020%2Fhighlight%2Ftrue%23M11161&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C71b51da26cca4bc246ef08dc1224a7ba%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638405196386425695%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C62000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=ze9fERVmmqo3YZ8Fbpwrmy8wb0KwNRbTJrWZdZJQVAY%3D&reserved=0] 
Best regards, 
Karl Wester-Ebbinghaus 
Senior IT Consultant 
--
